english.segment1: You've been dropped like a dream to the floor. You've been told not to try anymore. But you're wakened from yesterday's war. Cause you're a survivor
english.segment2: And your strength has been stolen away. And your faith has been worn to a fray. But you live to live on one more day. Cause you're a survivor
english.segment3: And nothing can stop you now. Nothing can back you down. You never give up. You never give in. You're a survivor
english.segment4: For the phone call that tore you apart. For the fear that gripped your heart. For the moment you saw who you are. And what you're made of
english.segment5: For the cancer that stole all your hair. For the smile like you just don't care. For your hope in midnight prayer. You're a survivor
english.segment6: And nothing can stop you now. Nothing can back you down. You never give up. You never give in. You're a survivor
english.segment7: I'm convinced neither death nor life. Neither demons or angels of light. Shadows present a future bright. Can seperate us
english.segment8: From the love that will lead us on. To the hope when all hope is gone. Til the day heaven calls us home. We are survivors
english.segment9: And nothing can stop us now. Nothing can back us down. We never give up. We never give in
english.segment10: And nothing can stop us now. Nothing can back us down. We never give up. We never give in. Cause we are survivors
english.segment11: We are. We are. Yeah. We are survivors. We are survivors
